name: Unusual quest
description:
Unusual quest - A story about a brave soldier in the service of the King. When the nearby lands are in danger, a soldier with a bunch of brave guys take the initiative into their own hands and go into the dark forest, destroy the demons and figure out what's the matter. Demons and enemies do not hesitate, and if we do not act now, who knows what will happen to the Royal Lands and the King himself.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You have to go through many levels, completing certain tasks and destroy enemies in the location.

Game Features:
- Many levels and tasks.
- Nice pixel graphics.
- Great soundtrack.
